name: Soccer Infinity Runner
description:
Jump, slide dodge and break the oncoming obstacles to escape from your grumbler neighbor without getting caught! Wanna be the King of soccer? Wanna be a legendary dribbler? Like famous soccer players?

Your dream will come true! Run through defenders! It's like dancing! Earn Coins and get better sports-wears. You'll get stronger! If you've ever dream to score a match-winning goal for your national team, this is your chance.

HOURS OF ENDLESS RUNNING football FUN

Brilliant 3D graphics
Offline! No internet connection required
Optimized for Small and all large screen devices!

Soccer infinity runner is one of the world’s top football players game- and experience the action of the Soccer World Cup 2018? See how it feels to Kick, Run, Dribble and Score like professional footballer in this unique 3D arcade runner! Put on your boots and surf through traffic in the streets of Moscow, strive to get the highest scores in intense competitive football games and you might even find yourself competing against none other than the real footballer!

AWESOME Soccer RUNNING GAME

RUN! Swipe to dodge the traffic rush!
OVERTAKE and kick football away!
ACTIVATE power-ups & boost your score!
SURF above obstacles with Gliders
USE MAGNETS to collect more Coins!
BURST THROUGH any obstacles with Shield Vest!
